attributes.action: Inaugurate a VE Day, Virus Eradicated Day, to honour all key workers.
attributes.additional_details:
The nation needs to honour the thousands putting others first and putting themselves at greater risk to keep the country moving forwards.  
Many are low paid and undervalued by society. This is an opportunity to give them the respect long overdue.
attributes.background: Inevitably,  the upcoming VE Day commemoration will have to be paused. Let us take the opportunity to raise our hats to NHS staff, emergency services, school staff, food supply staff and all others working in  adverse times for the benefit of the nation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
